titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation for the vessel White Seal.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/5/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade, the Great Lakes trade, and the fisheries.
